justification: B is 1-7 and conservative; this offer sends them an injured committee RB and a volatile WR while taking their only healthy QB (James Jones), hurting immediate wins. B values volume and veterans; Torres/White don’t fit. TE swap is dubious: A already has a Tier 1 TE, while Marcus Garcia is Tier 4—no upgrade for A, nor clear benefit for B. Rationale is generic and ignores key roster realities and preferences.
